mapper.select: SELECT prmt_pk AS BUQUE_PESCA , prmt_parametro AS BUQUE_PESCA_prmt , fini , ffin , ( SELECT prmt_pk FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_tppr_pk = portico.getEntidad('TIPO_IVA') AND prmt_parametro LIKE 'G' ) AS TIPO_IVA , ( SELECT prto_pk FROM tbl_puerto_prto WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_parametro = prto_codigo_corto AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_parametro_dato_prdt WHERE prdt_prmt_pk = prmt_pk AND prdt_prvr_pk = prvr_pk AND prdt_tpdt_pk = portico.getTipoDato('SUBPUERTO') ) ) ) AS prto_pk FROM ( SELECT prmt_pk, prmt_parametro, fini , ( SELECT prvr_pk FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk AND prvr_fini <= fini AND (prvr_ffin IS NULL OR prvr_ffin > fini) ) AS prvr_pk , COALESCE(LEAST(prvr_ffin, #{frefMax}), #{frefMax}) AS ffin FROM ( SELECT prmt_pk , prmt_parametro , ( SELECT MAX(prvr_ffin) FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk ) AS prvr_ffin , COALESCE( ( SELECT MAX(srvc_ffin) FROM tbl_servicio_srvc WHERE srvc_tpsr_pk = portico.getEntidad('BUQUE_PESCA_SRV') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_servicio_dato_srdt WHERE srdt_srvc_pk = srvc_pk AND srdt_tpdt_pk = portico.getTipoDato('BUQUE_PESCA') AND srdt_prmt_pk = prmt_pk ) ) , ( SELECT MIN(prvr_fini) FROM tbl_parametro_version_prvr WHERE prvr_prmt_pk = prmt_pk ) ) AS fini FROM tbl_parametro_prmt WHERE prmt_tppr_pk = portico.getEntidad('BUQUE_PESCA') ) sql WHERE fini < #{frefMax} ) sql WHERE fini < ffin
